root.title: equatori equa sign pact contel unit
root.body: equatori commun co satellit data network concern say sign agreement contel corp ctc contel asc unit allow contel asc buy 3.6 mln share equatori stock 3.25 dlr per share addit equatori say agreement contel asc would buy minimum 10 mln dlr equip equatori loan equatori six mln dlr assum portion equatori right oblig satellit transpond lea
